verses.name: Luke 1:1
verses.text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us,

verses.name: Luke 1:2
verses.text: Even as they delivered them unto us, which from the beginning were eyewitnesses, and ministers of the word;

verses.name: Luke 1:3
verses.text: It seemed good to me also, having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first, to write unto thee in order, most excellent Theophilus,

verses.name: Luke 1:4
verses.text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things, wherein thou hast been instructed.
